metadata.Title: CVE-2017-14333 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: The process_version_sections function in readelf.c in GNU Binutils 2.29 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (Integer Overflow, and hang because of a time-consuming loop) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted binary file with invalid values of ent.vn_next, during "readelf -a" execution.

notes.Note: leosilva> code in precise and trusty are quite different, needs backport sbeattie> for 2.29 branch, 64aa1246572306b72dc479b46d13ff749b0c3236 is an omnibus patch set mdeslaur> included in second CVE-2017-12450 commit

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
